tasks.task: Jesse discusses his agricultural journey from 1996, focusing on transitioning to no-till farming and implementing a three-way rotation.
subtasks: Describe starting farming in 1996 with 20 acres from his father.
Explain the initial challenges with wet spots and previous tillage methods (chisel plow, rotary hoe).
Describe transitioning to a permanent three-way rotation involving small grains like oats.
Emphasize the importance of gradual adoption of no-till practices (field by field progression).
Highlight benefits of introducing cover crops and cover cropping with livestock.
Address skepticism about profitability of small grains and argue for yield benefits in rotation.
